mapper.select: select id,itemId,shopId,userid,goods_url,goods_title,googs_seller,googs_img,googs_price,googs_number, googs_size,googs_color,freight,remark,datatime,norm_least,delivery_time,freight_free,bulk_volume,total_weight, width,perWeight,seilUnit,goodsUnit,per_weight,goods_email,free_shopping_company,free_sc_days,preferential,deposit_rate,guid,goods_type,feeprice,goods_class,pWprice, (select img from goods_typeimg where gc.id = goods_id) goods_typeimg,extra_freight,source_url,currency from shop_car_marketing gc where gc.userid = 587 and (state=0 or state=3) order by freight_free desc,free_shopping_company desc,datatime desc
mapper.update: update shop_car_marketing set price1 = #{goodsPrice} where id = #{goodsId} and userid = #{userId}
